trends: There has been one other sighting in Gobles
There were no other sightings in Gobles on or around August 11th 2012
divs: sighting details could not define the craft, surrounded by orange plasma discharge, headed south parallel to m-40, craft was moving slowly,i think it was about 1500 to 2000 ft off the ground,no sound,no running lights, appeared to be quite large. i was tuning in a new telescope and i looked up and there it was. i am 59 yrs old and work at a school. the other witness is the neighbors son he is in high school, he seen it first and said it did a 45 degree turn then passed over my location. 08\11\2012 10:18 pm
Summary: orange sphere did a 45 degree turn
